description: E-Waste Collection - PRS Operator for E-Waste
company_background: The ALBA Group was established in 1968 and operates Producer Responsibility Schemes internationally, including in Germany and Hong Kong. Since July 1st, 2021, the National Environment Agency (NEA) designated Alba as the official e-waste PRS operator in Singapore
services: Free e-waste collection for regulated materials exceeding 1 cubic meter in volume
Producer Responsibility Scheme (PRS) management for electronic waste
